content: If you reset client secret, all active consents and authorizations will be revoked. To apply the next consent, you need to use a new client secret. Note that all users will again be required to complete the consent screen.

comment.text: When resetting a client secret, all active consents and authorizations will be revoked. This message informs users that applying a new consent requires re-completion of the consent screen. It appears in a modal dialog as part of a reset button's context, indicating the consequences of resetting a client secret.

usage.context:
onClose={onClose}
 displayType={ModalDialogType.modal}
 >
 <ModalDialog.Header>{t("ResetHeader")}</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 <Trans t={t} i18nKey="ResetDescription" ns="OAuth" />
 </ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <Button
 className="delete-button"
 key="DeletePortalBtn"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "active consents and authorizations" is translated as "الموافقات والتفويضات النشطة". While technically correct, a more natural and commonly used Arabic equivalent would be something like "الصلاحيات والموافقات النشطة" (as-salahiyat wal-muwafaqat al-nashita). "تفويضات" (tafweedat) isn't as widely used in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "الموافقات والتفويضات النشطة" with "الصلاحيات والموافقات النشطة".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'active consents and authorizations' is translated as 'aktiv icazə və səlahiyyətlər'. While technically correct, a more natural and precise translation would be 'mövcud icazələr və səlahiyyətlər'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Müştəri sirrini sıfırlasanız, bütün mövcud icazə və səlahiyyətlər ləğv edilir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To apply the next consent' is translated as 'Növbəti təsdiqi tətbiq etmək üçün'. While understandable, a more natural translation might be 'Növbəti razılığı tətbiq etmək üçün'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Müştəri sirrini sıfırlasanız, bütün mövcud icazə və səlahiyyətlər ləğv edilir. Növbəti razılığı tətbiq etmək üçün yeni müştəri sirrini istifadə etməlisiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'оторизация' (otoryzatsiya) is a loanword and not the preferred term. 'Разрешения' (razryazheniya) is more appropriate in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ако нулирате клиентската тайна, всички активни съгласия и разрешения ще бъдат отменени.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'důvěrný klientský klíč' is a slightly awkward translation of 'client secret'. 'Klientské tajemství' is a better and more commonly used term in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pokud resetujete klientské tajemství...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Pro použití dalšího souhlasu je třeba použít nový důvěrný klientský klíč' is grammatically correct but could be phrased more naturally.  'Pro použití dalšího souhlasu potřebujete nový klientské tajemství' or 'Budete potřebovat nový klientské tajemství pro použití dalšího souhlasu' would flow better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pro použití dalšího souhlasu budete potřebovat nový klientské tajemství.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'uuttaa' is a misspelling of 'uutta'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: uutta

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'reset' is translated as 'վերականգնել' (verakangnel), which means 'restore' or 'recover'. A more accurate translation for 'reset' in this context would be 'փոխարինել' (poxarinel) or 'փոխել' (poxel) - meaning 'replace' or 'change'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Եթե փոխարինել հաճախորդի գաղտնի բանալին...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'active consents and authorizations' is translated as 'ակտիվ համաձայնությունները և թույլտվությունները'. While accurate, it could be improved for clarity and flow. Consider a more natural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Եթե փոխարինել հաճախորդի գաղտնի բանալին, բոլոր գործող համաձայնությունները և թույլտվությունները կչեղարկվեն:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Se si ripristina" is grammatically awkward in this context. While technically correct, it sounds less natural than a more direct construction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Se si reimposta il segreto del cliente

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'consensi' is translated as 'consents', but 'consensi' carries a slightly more formal and legalistic nuance that might not be the ideal fit for the English original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: If the intent is to precisely reflect the original English, consider using a more neutral term like 'autorizzazioni' or rephrasing the sentence to avoid the direct translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຄວາມລັບຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້ (client secret)" is repeated excessively and sounds unnatural in Lao. While technically correct, it can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to avoid repetition. For example: 'ຖ້າທ່ານປ່ຽນຄວາມລັບຂອງຄລາຍເອັນต์ (client secret),...' or 'ຖ້າທ່ານປ່ຽນຄລາຍເອັນຕ໌ເຊັກເກັດ (client secret)...'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ໜ້າຈໍອີ້ນຍິນໃຫມ່ອີ້ນ" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey 'consent screen.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "ໜ້າຈໍອີ້ນຍິນໃຫມ່ອີ້ນ" with something more accurate like "ໜ້າຈໍການຕົກລົງໃຫມ່" or "ໜ້າຈໍອະນຸຍາດໃຫມ່".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation is a single paragraph. Consider breaking it into shorter sentences for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Divide the text into shorter, more digestible sentences. For example, one sentence per idea.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'to apply the next consent' is awkward and doesn't quite capture the intended meaning. A better translation would convey the need to *obtain* or *use* the next consent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lai iegūtu/izmantoja nākamā piekrišana...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Lai pieteiktos nākamajai piekrišanai' is grammatically incorrect. 'Pieteikties' is used for signing in or applying for something, not obtaining consent. The translation needs to express the action of needing the next consent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lai iegūtu nākamā piekrišana...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "autoryzacja zostaną" should be "autoryzacje zostaną".  'Autoryzacja' is feminine singular, while 'autoryzacje' is feminine plural, and it's referring to multiple authorizations.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jeśli zresetujesz sekret klienta, wszystkie aktywne zgody i autoryzacje zostaną cofnięte.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'należy' can be slightly formal and clunky in this context. A more conversational and natural-sounding option would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aby zastosować kolejną zgodę, użyj nowego sekretu klienta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Para aplicar o próximo consentimento precisa usar novo segredo do cliente' is grammatically awkward. It should be more formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para aplicar o próximo consentimento, é necessário usar um novo segredo do cliente.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'utilizadors' is misspelled. It should be 'usuários'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: usuários

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'cheie secretă a clientului' is a bit clunky. While technically correct, a more natural Romanian phrasing would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: cheie secretă de client

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Rețineți că toți utilizatori vor fi obligați să completeze din nou pagina de consimțământ' has a grammatical error. 'Utilizatori' needs to be in the genitive case.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rețineți că toți utilizatorii vor fi obligați să completeze din nou pagina de consimțământ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "පාරිභෝගික රහසය" (Pari bhogika Rahasyaya) is a literal translation of 'client secret'. While understandable, a more natural phrasing in Sinhala would be something like 'අයදුම්පත් රහස්‍ය' (Ayadumpatha Rahasya) or 'මුහුණු පත්‍ර රහස්‍ය' (Muhunupathra Rahasya).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'අයදුම්පත් රහස්‍ය' (Ayadumpatha Rahasya) or 'මුහුණු පත්‍ර රහස්‍ය' (Muhunupathra Rahasya) for 'client secret'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "සියලු කැමැත්තම්" (Siyallu Kamemattum) is a literal and slightly awkward translation of "all consents." A more fluent phrasing could be "සියලු කැමැත්තන්" (Siyallu Kamemattan) or  "සියලු කැමැත්තන් සියල්ලම" (Siyallu Kamemattan Siyallama).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "සියලු කැමැත්තන්" (Siyallu Kamemattan) or "සියලු කැමැත්තන් සියල්ලම" (Siyallu Kamemattan Siyallama).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'අහෝසි' (Ahoisi) translates to 'canceled' or 'abolished', which is accurate but feels slightly formal for this context. A softer approach might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more approachable verb like 'ඉක්මතු කරනු ලැබේ' (Ikmuthu Karunu Leveda) - meaning 'will be removed/terminated'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'පරිශීලකයින්' (Parishilakayin) is technically correct, but 'භාවිත කරන්නන්' (Pavitanne Kannanna) - 'users' - would sound more natural and accessible to a wider audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'පරිශීලකයින්' (Parishilakayin) with 'භාවිත කරන්නන්' (Pavitanne Kannanna).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'odjemalca' is repeated multiple times. While technically correct, it can be stylistically improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a pronoun or rephrasing to avoid repetition. For example: 'Če ponastavite skrivnost odjemalca, bodo vsa aktivna soglasja in pooblastila preklicana. Za naslednje soglasje potrebujete novo skrivnost. Upoštevajte, da bodo vsi uporabniki znova morali izpolniti zaslon za soglasje.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'авторизација' is a direct transliteration from 'authorization' and while understandable, 'овлашћење' is a more natural and common term for authorization in Serbian in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Замену 'авторизација' са 'овлашћење'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'За примену следећег пристанка потребно је користити нови тајни кључ клијента' is grammatically correct but a more fluid and natural phrasing would improve readability. The direct translation of 'To apply the next consent' is a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: За следећи пристанак потребно је користити нови тајни кључ клијента.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'pristanici' is a less common and potentially confusing term for 'consents' in this context. While technically correct, 'saglasnosti' would be more natural and understandable to a wider audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'pristanici' with 'saglasnosti'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'Za primenu sledećeg pristanka' is a bit clunky. It could be smoother.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'Za primenu sledećeg pristanka' with 'Da biste primenili sledeći pristanak' or 'Za primenu sledećeg saglasnosti'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'authorization' is translated as 'autorizacija'. While acceptable, 'odobrenje' or 'odobrenje' might be more idiomatic and accurately convey the intended meaning, especially considering it's referring to user authorization.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'autorizacija' with 'odobrenje'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'to apply the next consent' is awkward and not the most natural translation of 'To apply the next consent'. A more natural translation would be 'to use the next consent' or 'to proceed with the next consent'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: to use the next consent

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'proceed' feels more natural and accurately conveys the intended meaning. The current translation of 'apply' doesn't fully capture the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: to proceed with the next consent

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “Ủy quyền” is a less common and potentially confusing term for "authorization" in this context. A more accessible term would be "phép ủy quyền" or simply rephrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nếu bạn đặt lại client secret, tất cả sự đồng ý và phép ủy quyền đang hoạt động sẽ bị thu hồi. Hoặc: Nếu bạn đặt lại client secret, tất cả sự đồng ý và các quyền đang hoạt động sẽ bị thu hồi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “Màn hình” is too literal translation for "screen." It should be phrased to be more natural in Vietnamese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lưu ý rằng tất cả người dùng sẽ được yêu cầu hoàn thành lại quá trình đồng ý.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure and flow could be improved for better readability. The current structure is a bit choppy.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nếu bạn đặt lại client secret, tất cả sự đồng ý và các quyền đang hoạt động sẽ bị thu hồi. Để áp dụng sự đồng ý tiếp theo, bạn cần sử dụng client secret mới. Lưu ý rằng tất cả người dùng sẽ được yêu cầu hoàn thành lại quá trình đồng ý.
